pullrequest.title: Start porting release process to GitHub

content.raw:
* Created the `sdformat9-release` repo on GitHub: https://github.com/ignition-release/sdformat9-release
* Created the [sdformat9](#!/osrf/release-tools/commits/c3b660e7b400cff611f206b5f6a1767c35e252ab) branch on this repo
* Triggered `_dsl_sdformat` with that branch and created https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat9-debbuilder/
* And triggered a `sdformat9.0.0~pre1` pre-release using this branch:
    * Homebrew: [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_pull_request_updater/540/badge/icon)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_pull_request_updater/540/), https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/pull/884
    * Linux: queued in https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat9-debbuilder/
content.html:
• Created the sdformat9-release repo on GitHub: https://github.com/ignition-release/sdformat9-release
  • Created the sdformat9 branch on this repo
  • Triggered _dsl_sdformat with that branch and created https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat9-debbuilder/
  • And triggered a sdformat9.0.0~pre1 pre-release using this branch:
    • Homebrew: , https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/pull/884
    • Linux: queued in https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat9-debbuilder/
